turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sandie, can you order be a cherry mocha from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which of the starbucks are you referring

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am at a clients location today in silver springs, eire so the one closes to this location

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I see an address 34 bridgeport road. Is that pretty close to you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: actually it is just down the block from me so that will be perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok now how would you like you cherry mocha and what size

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a tall cherry mocha with almond milk and whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will not be able to get the almond milk

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what do they have instead

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have coconut and 2%milk only

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: then let me have the cocunut milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good. anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: on that note, could you ask for some extra whipped cream on top

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what's the price and time of arrival

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: total cost is $15 with tax and you should be ready for pick up in 5 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great. that will do

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just to confirm your order- a tall cherry mocha drink with extra whipped cream on top with coconut milk and you will pick it up at the 34 bridgeport road location in silver springs

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that's it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will receive a confirmation via text message on your mobile

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you, my dear

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye
